https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pxf7dGhwpwxe8b1itqxkkjFQac8.jpg An insurance agent who moonlights as a carthief steals cars various crooks and never from the common people. He sells the stolen cars and gives the money to charity. His best friend, a cop, is assigned to bring in this modern robin hood. Beware of the Car!
